title: How to Do the Work, with Holistic Psychologist Dr. Nicole LePera
description:
Dr. Nicole LePera is on the show to help us learn how to tolerate being misunderstood, stay true to ourselves, and celebrate our unique purpose and journey to fulfill our potential and destiny. 

Guest Links:

For information about Dr. LePera’s monthly self-led membership, SelfHealers Circle: www.theholisticpsychologist.com

Check out the book, HOW TO DO THE WORK: Recognize Your Patterns, Heal from Your Past, and Create Your Self 

IG: @the.holistic.psychologist


For 25% off The Fitness App by Jillian Michaels, go to www.thefitnessapp.com/podcastdeal

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

Email your questions to JillianPodcast@gmail.com


This Week’s Sponsor:

JENNIKAYNE.com, promo code JillianMichaels for 15% off your first order


You can find new episodes of Keeping It Real: Conversations with Jillian Michaels, completely ad free, on Wondery+ https://wondery.app.link/jillian

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
